typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	P_DATA_FI as string
}
source(output(
		ID_COMARCA as decimal(2,0),
		COD_CARRETERA as string,
		COD_TRAM as string,
		COD_SUBTRAM as string,
		COD_MODIFICACIO as decimal(15,0),
		COD_ORGANISME as string,
		COD_ORGTRAM as string,
		PK_INI as decimal(9,0),
		METRES_PK_INI as decimal(4,0),
		DESC_PK_INI as string,
		PK_FI as decimal(9,0),
		METRES_FI as decimal(4,0),
		DESC_PK_FI as string,
		IND_IMD as decimal(2,0),
		NUM_LONG_REAL as decimal(9,3),
		NUM_LONG_APARENT as decimal(9,3),
		DESC_NOM_CARRILS as string,
		DATA_CALCUL_IMD as string,
		DATA_ALTA as string,
		DATA_BAIXA as string,
		DATA_VALIDACIO as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DMDimSubtrams
source(output(
		ID_COMARCA as decimal(2,0),
		COD_CARRETERA as string,
		COD_TRAM as string,
		COD_SUBTRAM as string,
		COD_MODIFICACIO as decimal(15,0),
		COD_ORGANISME as string,
		COD_ORGTRAM as string,
		PK_INI as decimal(9,0),
		METRES_PK_INI as decimal(4,0),
		DESC_PK_INI as string,
		PK_FI as decimal(9,0),
		METRES_FI as decimal(4,0),
		DESC_PK_FI as string,
		IND_IMD as decimal(2,0),
		NUM_LONG_REAL as decimal(9,3),
		NUM_LONG_APARENT as decimal(9,3),
		DESC_NOM_CARRILS as string,
		DATA_CALCUL_IMD as string,
		DATA_ALTA as string,
		DATA_BAIXA as string,
		DATA_VALIDACIO as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DMDimSubtrams2
FilterCatalunya aggregate(groupBy(DMDimSubtrams@COD_CARRETERA,
		COD_TRAM,
		COD_SUBTRAM),
	COD_MOD_MAX = max(DMDimSubtrams@COD_MODIFICACIO)) ~> MaxModificacioCat
Join8 filter(isNull(DATA_BAIXA)) ~> FilterData
FilterData filter(like(COD_ORGANISME,'ST%') && COD_ORGTRAM != 'DES') ~> FilterCatalunya
FilterMaxModificacio derive(AMBIT = 'Catalunya',
		DATA_ANYO = substring($P_DATA_FI,1,4)) ~> AddAmbit
AddAmbit aggregate(groupBy(AMBIT,
		DATA_ANYO),
	qmPublicats = sum(NUM_LONG_REAL)) ~> addQmPublicats
FilterData filter(like(COD_ORGANISME,'STCB') && COD_ORGTRAM != 'DES') ~> FilterBarcelona
FilterData filter(like(COD_ORGANISME,'STCG') && COD_ORGTRAM != 'DES') ~> FilterGirona
FilterData filter(like(COD_ORGANISME,'STCL') && COD_ORGTRAM != 'DES') ~> FilterLleida
FilterData filter(like(COD_ORGANISME,'STCT') && COD_ORGTRAM != 'DES') ~> FilterTarragona
FilterData filter(like(COD_ORGANISME,'STME') && COD_ORGTRAM != 'DES') ~> FilterTerresdelEbre
FilterData filter(like(COD_ORGANISME,'ST%') && COD_ORGTRAM != 'DES' && COD_ORGTRAM != 'DIR') ~> FilterConcesio
FilterCatalunya, MaxModificacioCat join(DMDimSubtrams@COD_CARRETERA == MaxModificacioCat@COD_CARRETERA
	&& DMDimSubtrams@COD_TRAM == MaxModificacioCat@COD_TRAM
	&& DMDimSubtrams@COD_SUBTRAM == MaxModificacioCat@COD_SUBTRAM,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 filter(DMDimSubtrams@COD_MODIFICACIO == COD_MOD_MAX) ~> FilterMaxModificacio
FilterBarcelona aggregate(groupBy(DMDimSubtrams@COD_CARRETERA,
		COD_SUBTRAM,
		COD_TRAM),
	COD_MOD_MAX = max(DMDimSubtrams@COD_MODIFICACIO)) ~> MaxModificacioBar
FilterBarcelona, MaxModificacioBar join(DMDimSubtrams@COD_CARRETERA == MaxModificacioBar@COD_CARRETERA
	&& DMDimSubtrams@COD_SUBTRAM == MaxModificacioBar@COD_SUBTRAM
	&& DMDimSubtrams@COD_TRAM == MaxModificacioBar@COD_TRAM,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 filter(DMDimSubtrams@COD_MODIFICACIO == COD_MOD_MAX) ~> FilterMaxModificacio2
FilterMaxModificacio2 derive(AMBIT = 'Barcelona',
		DATA_ANYO = substring($P_DATA_FI,1,4)) ~> AddAmbit2
AddAmbit2 aggregate(groupBy(AMBIT,
		DATA_ANYO),
	qmPublicats = sum(NUM_LONG_REAL)) ~> addQmPublicats2
addQmPublicats, addQmPublicats2, addQmPublicats7, addQmPublicats6, addQmPublicats5, addQmPublicats4, addQmPublicats3 union(byName: true)~> Union1
FilterGirona aggregate(groupBy(DMDimSubtrams@COD_CARRETERA,
		COD_TRAM,
		COD_SUBTRAM),
	COD_MOD_MAX = max(DMDimSubtrams@COD_MODIFICACIO)) ~> MaxModificacioGir
FilterGirona, MaxModificacioGir join(DMDimSubtrams@COD_CARRETERA == MaxModificacioGir@COD_CARRETERA
	&& DMDimSubtrams@COD_TRAM == MaxModificacioGir@COD_TRAM
	&& DMDimSubtrams@COD_SUBTRAM == MaxModificacioGir@COD_SUBTRAM,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
Join3 filter(DMDimSubtrams@COD_MODIFICACIO == COD_MOD_MAX) ~> FilterMaxModificacio3
FilterMaxModificacio3 derive(AMBIT = 'Girona',
		DATA_ANYO = substring($P_DATA_FI,1,4)) ~> AddAmbit3
AddAmbit3 aggregate(groupBy(AMBIT,
		DATA_ANYO),
	qmPublicats = sum(NUM_LONG_REAL)) ~> addQmPublicats3
FilterLleida aggregate(groupBy(DMDimSubtrams@COD_CARRETERA,
		COD_TRAM,
		COD_SUBTRAM),
	COD_MOD_MAX = max(DMDimSubtrams@COD_MODIFICACIO)) ~> MaxModificacioLle
FilterLleida, MaxModificacioLle join(DMDimSubtrams@COD_CARRETERA == MaxModificacioLle@COD_CARRETERA
	&& DMDimSubtrams@COD_TRAM == MaxModificacioLle@COD_TRAM
	&& DMDimSubtrams@COD_SUBTRAM == MaxModificacioLle@COD_SUBTRAM,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join4
Join4 filter(DMDimSubtrams@COD_MODIFICACIO == COD_MOD_MAX) ~> FilterMaxModificacio4
FilterMaxModificacio4 derive(AMBIT = 'Lleida',
		DATA_ANYO = substring($P_DATA_FI,1,4)) ~> AddAmbit4
AddAmbit4 aggregate(groupBy(AMBIT,
		DATA_ANYO),
	qmPublicats = sum(NUM_LONG_REAL)) ~> addQmPublicats4
FilterTarragona aggregate(groupBy(DMDimSubtrams@COD_CARRETERA,
		COD_TRAM,
		COD_SUBTRAM),
	COD_MOD_MAX = max(DMDimSubtrams@COD_MODIFICACIO)) ~> MaxModificacioTar
FilterTarragona, MaxModificacioTar join(DMDimSubtrams@COD_CARRETERA == MaxModificacioTar@COD_CARRETERA
	&& DMDimSubtrams@COD_TRAM == MaxModificacioTar@COD_TRAM
	&& DMDimSubtrams@COD_SUBTRAM == MaxModificacioTar@COD_SUBTRAM,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join5
Join5 filter(DMDimSubtrams@COD_MODIFICACIO == COD_MOD_MAX) ~> FilterMaxModificacio5
FilterMaxModificacio5 derive(AMBIT = 'Tarragona',
		DATA_ANYO = substring($P_DATA_FI,1,4)) ~> AddAmbit5
AddAmbit5 aggregate(groupBy(AMBIT,
		DATA_ANYO),
	qmPublicats = sum(NUM_LONG_REAL)) ~> addQmPublicats5
FilterTerresdelEbre aggregate(groupBy(DMDimSubtrams@COD_CARRETERA,
		COD_TRAM,
		COD_SUBTRAM),
	COD_MOD_MAX = max(DMDimSubtrams@COD_MODIFICACIO)) ~> MaxModificacioElb
FilterTerresdelEbre, MaxModificacioElb join(DMDimSubtrams@COD_CARRETERA == MaxModificacioElb@COD_CARRETERA
	&& DMDimSubtrams@COD_TRAM == MaxModificacioElb@COD_TRAM
	&& DMDimSubtrams@COD_SUBTRAM == MaxModificacioElb@COD_SUBTRAM,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join6
Join6 filter(DMDimSubtrams@COD_MODIFICACIO == COD_MOD_MAX) ~> FilterMaxModificacio6
FilterMaxModificacio6 derive(AMBIT = "Terres de l'Ebre",
		DATA_ANYO = substring($P_DATA_FI,1,4)) ~> AddAmbit6
AddAmbit6 aggregate(groupBy(AMBIT,
		DATA_ANYO),
	qmPublicats = sum(NUM_LONG_REAL)) ~> addQmPublicats6
FilterConcesio aggregate(groupBy(DMDimSubtrams@COD_CARRETERA,
		COD_SUBTRAM,
		COD_TRAM),
	COD_MOD_MAX = max(DMDimSubtrams@COD_MODIFICACIO)) ~> MaxModificacioCon
FilterConcesio, MaxModificacioCon join(DMDimSubtrams@COD_CARRETERA == MaxModificacioCon@COD_CARRETERA
	&& DMDimSubtrams@COD_TRAM == MaxModificacioCon@COD_TRAM
	&& DMDimSubtrams@COD_SUBTRAM == MaxModificacioCon@COD_SUBTRAM,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join7
Join7 filter(DMDimSubtrams@COD_MODIFICACIO == COD_MOD_MAX) ~> FilterMaxModificacio7
FilterMaxModificacio7 derive(AMBIT = 'Carreteres en concessiÃ³',
		DATA_ANYO = substring($P_DATA_FI,1,4)) ~> AddAmbit7
AddAmbit7 aggregate(groupBy(AMBIT,
		DATA_ANYO),
	qmPublicats = sum(NUM_LONG_REAL)) ~> addQmPublicats7
Union1 derive(DATA_ANYO = toInteger(DATA_ANYO)) ~> toInt
DMDimSubtrams, DMDimSubtramsMODMAX join(DMDimSubtrams@COD_CARRETERA == DMDimSubtramsMODMAX@COD_CARRETERA
	&& DMDimSubtrams@COD_MODIFICACIO == DMDimSubtramsMODMAX@COD_MODIFICACIO,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join8
Filter1 aggregate(groupBy(COD_CARRETERA),
	COD_MODIFICACIO = max(COD_MODIFICACIO)) ~> DMDimSubtramsMODMAX
DMDimSubtrams2 filter(year(DATA_VALIDACIO) <= year(toDate($P_DATA_FI, 'yyyyMMdd'))) ~> Filter1
toInt sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Ambit as string,
		qmPublicats as decimal(38,3)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DMDimSubtramsAgrAmbit
